hero.headline: Tired to have one application to drive your blinds, one other for your lights and one again for your gate ? Yadoms provides a solution that can make devices from different brands speak together and be drivable from only one software

paragraph.main:
Forget pricing and proprietary softwares, Yadoms is fully open source and fully free. Download and use it.
If you want the source code, no problem, go on our
paragraph.licence: *Yadoms is released under GPL v3 licence. All plugins, widgets and scripts developped are released under LGPL v3 licence.

automates.paragraph: Build scenario to automate tasks like watering your garden or close blinds when night is falling. You can also ask to Yadoms to send you an SMS if you forget to close garage door at night fall. With Yadoms, Automation is simple !
